column4: Madhu___, I have a folder with left over files from purging gimp, those are all I want to mess with.  Doing a chown and chnod on each individual file take forever
you know both chmod and chown can do resursive changes, right?
also, "leftover" sounds like a good way to delete something some other part of the system is still using. Are you that short of harddrive space?
